extendedInfo.description: â¥ NEW HEARTS HOTNESS â¥ Free Sweet Heart Go SMS theme! Special attention was given to this design to make it extra beautiful for you. Lots of hearts, a touch of lace, all in a pink motif through out. Super cute matching Go Locker can be found here: http://goo.gl/iVEIZIf you would like to support or prefer the paid version you can find it here: http://goo.gl/RBUweâ Works on Jelly Bean!â Lovely heart design in the foreground, hot pink heart montage in the backgroundâ 2 free fonts included, see instructions below on how to use them, it's easy!â Heart lace pattern accents the top and bottom of the chat screenâ 2 3D hearts for profile iconsâ Cute matching popup chat window with pink hearts and laceâ 2 crisp chat bubbles topped with a beautiful shiny 3D heartâ 2 different cute custom backgrounds for messaging and conversation views â Customized text colors for all GO SMS screensâ 33 rounded shiny pink gleaming application icons decorated with 4 hearts in the cornersâ This theme is designed to be completely cute and awesome but still make it easy to read your messages, enjoy!â Cute bird characters by Tatomieâ Theme can be stored on your SD Cardâ + Lots more fun little things to discover!About Go SMS Pro:GO SMS PRO brings you cool UI, fast and convenient SMS/MMS experience. GO SMS Pro is the most popular messaging app; Very powerful, Cool, Funny, Safe, Fully customizable; Well support SMS/MMS + GO Chat(free message) + Walkie Talkie(free voice). MUST HAVE. Search GO SMS, install it if you don't have have it. Then...To apply theme:Open GO SMS Pro > press Menu > Themes > Sweet Heart > ApplyChanging Fonts/Sizes:Open GO SMS Pro > press Menu > Settings > Appearance Settings > Scan Font PackagesAfter the scan is complete go to > Conversation Customization > Change the Incoming Font > Change the Outgoing Font. Look for "CuteFont" font name. You can do the same for under Conversation List & Popup Window Customization under Settings. Itâs easy once you find where all the settings are!If you enjoy the theme let me know in the ratings, thank you!To support the time spent creating and customizing our themes this free version periodically presents Airpush/Leadbolt advertisements in your notification bar and/or icons. *** Any problems, feedback, or requests just email support@jellytap.com, we like hearing from the people using our themes! ***Thanks for your interest in our designs!Keywords: go sms pro, love theme, heart theme, pink heart theme, pink theme, purple theme, cute theme, fun theme, girly theme, valentines day theme, valentine theme

reviews.title: I\'m impressed
reviews.comment: It\'s gracefully made. I love how it looks on my phone with my heart font. Your other themes don\'t match up to this theme... please make more themes like this! I would love for you to make a better pink owl theme and possibly make a bow theme! I will be waiting to see What you come up with.. ;)
